Links to usefull websites

Find life changing scholarships at Scholly
Scholly is the #1 college scholarship app in the world and has helped students win more than $100 million dollars.

Apply for FAFSA
Federal Student Aid is available to ALL US Citizens
List of afforable universities
In the best value schools website listed above, you specify your degree, major and subject, and it will link you to the best universities.
All HBCU (Historically Black Colleges)
Historically Black Colleges or universities are institutions of higher education in the United States that were established before the Civil Rights Act of 1964 HBCUs offer all students, regardless of race, an opportunity to develop their skills and talents.
List of HSI (Hispanic Serving Institutions)
Hispanic Serving Institutions are total Hispanic enrollment constitutes a minimum of 25% of the total enrollment. HSI are focused on having as much Hispanic students as possible, but accept students from all backgrounds. All Puerto Rico's Universities are listed as HSIs
-Spanish- Universidades en Puerto Rico
The University of Puerto Rico is an alternative to Spanish as a first or second language students to be able to pursue undergraduate and graduate studies.
La Universidad de Puerto Rico es una alternativa para estudiantes, con el Español como primer o segundo idioma, poder perseguir estudios pregrados y posgrados.

Interested in Investments or Long Term Goals?

Investment App Acorns
Acorns is a simple application that you can download on your mobile device and for just $1-$3 a month, you can invest your spare change and earn small contributions. Acorns also gives advice on how to save for retirement, whether you are a young student who wants to dedicate to investments, or someone who wants a savings plan and be prepared for the worst.
Are you a parent? Look at What JP Morgan Chase has to offer
"Whether you’re thinking about retirement, a college fund or other financial goals, we’re ready to help you." As a parent, it is really important to be able to invest and save wisely, so that your children will have as much opportunities as they can, regarding undergraduate school. This JP Morgan Chase website is designed to inform you as a parent about future savings. Whether it is Retirement, Investing, Saving on Education, etc, they have the tools necessary to help you plan for the future.
Student Loans for College
For high-school students, parents, or any undergraduate looking for funds, college student loans facilitate the application, by giving you an estidmated loan ammount in just minutes. So if you are not sure how to get funds for yourself or your children, this is an easy way to apply.
Real Estate Investments
Looking for small investments effortlessly? Starting from $500, you can invest in Fundrise and always expect income with no risks involved.
Stock Investments
Learn the basics of Stock investments through here, and how to invest wisely even with little money to spare.
